comment:
* The FilterEffect class is the base class for all Effects based on Filters from the Mobile
 * Filter Framework (MFF).
 * @hide

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment:
* Get the effect name.
     *
     * Returns the unique name of the effect, which matches the name used for instantiating this
     * effect by the EffectFactory.
     *
     * @return The name of the effect.

methods.name: protected void beginGLEffect()
methods.comment:
* Call this before manipulating the GL context. Will assert that the GL environment is in a
     * valid state, and save it.

methods.name: protected void endGLEffect()
methods.comment: * Call this after manipulating the GL context. Restores the previous GL state.

methods.name: protected FilterContext getFilterContext()
methods.comment: * Returns the active filter context for this effect.

methods.name: protected Frame frameFromTexture(int texId, int width, int height)
methods.comment: * Converts a texture into a Frame.

methodNames: protected Frame frameFromTexture(int texId, int width, int height)
